basics.name: Christian Elsee
basics.label: DevOps Technical Lead
basics.summary:
Classically trained, multidisciplinary engineer, informed by two decades of industry experience. Filled multiple engineering roles, from backend development to operations, systems administration and reliability, addressing most points of the technology stack. Led multiple teams, in the most competitive national markets, while managing problems at scale.

For the last two years, I have acted as the primary caregiver to my now 4 y/o daughter, and as a result, have engaged primarily in consultancy work; now that she has reached school age, I am excited to join a talented team that is working on interesting and challenging problems.
